product.description: A sleek, frosted glass divider that provides privacy and reduces distractions, fitting seamlessly into any desk setup.
product.target_audience_appeal: Ideal for remote workers in co-working spaces needing a bit of personal space without sacrificing style.

branding.short_description: Sleek frosted glass divider for a distraction-free workspace.
branding.long_description: Create your own Zen space with our ZenSpace Desk Divider. This minimalist accessory provides privacy and reduces distractions, allowing you to focus on your work without sacrificing style. Made from high-quality frosted glass, it fits seamlessly into any desk setup.
branding.instagram_caption: Find your Zen with our stylish ZenSpace Desk Divider. Stay focused and productive in your workspace with this sleek accessory. #ZenSpace #DeskDivider #MinimalistWorkplace
